text: Fred B. Hadley (July 2, 1911 – August 2, 1988) was a member of the Ohio House of Representatives, serving from 1967 to 1978. A longtime legislator, Hadley was often involved in legislation regarding education,Hadley weighs in on education technology advancement, and labor issues. His district consisted of the direct Northwestern Corner of Ohio.Rep. Fred Hadley (R-Defiance) ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Ohio Republicans Category:Members of the Ohio House of Representatives Category:20th-century American politicians
title: Fred Hadley
